thread.title: MITCHELL, KATHERINE

author: MITCHELL, KATHERINE
title: MITCHELL, KATHERINE
text: I have used WLL for at least 9 years-- they sold me my first fully automatic machine, and I have replaced it twice (used 4+ times/day 7 days/week). If I have a question on the machine, they are always able to answer it and walk me thru any minor cleaning or adjustment issues. They carry great whole bean decaf--I like Lavazza DEK and WLL Unconditional. Ground shipments arrive across the country in 2-3 days so they must ship immediately. Great company to do business with, and no one paid me or gave me a discount for this review!
